description: Igihe cyo kubyara ari igihe cyo kwitondera cyane ku mubyeyi n’umwana atwite.
title: Igihe cyo kubyara ari igihe cyo kwitondera cyane ku mubyeyi n’umwana atwite.
content: Igihe cyo kubyara ari igihe cyo kwitondera cyane ku mubyeyi n’umwana atwite. Niyo mpamvu rero umubyeyi agomba kubyarira kwa muganga kugira ngo abaganga babihuguriwe bamukurikiranire ha; haramutse havutse ikibazo kibe cyakemuka nta ngaruka mbi zibayeho.
